DOC.brief_summary: An open, observational health economic study to estimate marginal cost and health consequences of replacing conventional Parkinsons disease therapy with intraduodenal levodopa administered continuously
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Delivery of Levodopa in Patients With Advanced Idiopathic Parkinsons Disease - Cost-benefit
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of of idiopathic Parkinsons disease Motor fluctuations despite optimised per oral treatment Severe dementia, confusion, psychosis or depression Patients with contraindications against levodopa treatment
